review: We did our research on fire stick tv against the other wifi sticks out there.  1.) We have had Netflix with no connection to our tv forever-- 2.) We added the prime tv for the year (Free 2 day shipping is a bonus)-- 3.) We aren't cloud people..i.e. Google or icloud.. It was easy to set up and I did it while drinking a beer..so it was really easy. Now that football season is winding down we need to catch up on shows and movies that we couldn't get on cable. We probably wont be buying the voice remote but we are considering the game remote in the future for the grandchildren.Love the fire stick so far and its 1/2 the price of apple tv.
